title: unexpected keyword argument 'keepdim'
body_html:
Hi,

In the docs it appears that reduction operations should accept a boolean parameter "keepdim" that controls whether the number of dimensions is reduced. I have the latest version of PyTorch and I get an unexpected keyword argument error for all of them. Is it not implemented yet?

Thanks,
Shawn
body_text:

body:
Hi,

In the docs it appears that reduction operations should accept a boolean parameter "keepdim" that controls whether the number of dimensions is reduced.  I have the latest version of PyTorch and I get an unexpected keyword argument error for all of them.  Is it not implemented yet?

Thanks,
